content:
Good morning!
I have a question on the profile PlannetOrganization in relation to the contact information and organization address.
Any given organization can have multiple address and different contact information for each address. In the organization profile, there does not appear to be a way to tie an instance of the contact element to the address element. What is the standard mechanisms to link and/or associate the two together?

PlannetLocation is used to provide the location-specific information and contact information.
A Location references an organization through its managingOrganization field.
See https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/Slide2.png

I can see that in this IG, for the CapabilityStatement, for the Organization resource, coverage-area is listed https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/CapabilityStatement-plan-net.html but I don't see this present in the Organization profile. I do see it in other resources though (InsurancePlan and HealthcareService). Is this a mistake in the table for the CapabilityStatement? Or am I missing something?
